title: NASA Teams Coordinate 3I/Atlas Observation Campaign
summary: Ground and space-based telescopes align to track the interstellar object as it enters the Mars flyby window in early October.

title: ESA Solar Orbiter Detects 3I/Atlas Coma Variability
summary: Particle instruments aboard Solar Orbiter record shifts in 3I/Atlas dust and gas output, offering clues to the comet's volatile reservoirs.

title: Amateur Network Captures 3I/Atlas Tail Lengthening
summary: Citizen scientists contributing to the Atlas Watch program spotted rapid 3I/Atlas tail growth as the comet crosses 1.5 AU from the Sun.
